name: UnityTestTask
description: Tests a Unity project and produce the results in NUnit compatible files.
helpMarkDown: Tests a Unity project and produce the results in NUnit compatible files. [More Information](https://github.com/Dinomite-Studios/unity-azure-pipelines-tasks)
author: Dinomite Studios

inputs.name: testMode
inputs.label: Test Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: The mode you want to run tests in. Available platforms are Edit Mode and Play Mode.

inputs.name: unityEditorsPathMode
inputs.label: Unity Editors Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define where to look for Unity installations on the agent.

options.environmentVariable: Use UNITYHUB_EDITORS_FOLDER_LOCATION environment variable on agent

inputs.name: customUnityEditorsPath
inputs.label: Editors Folder Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify where to look for Unity Editor versions on the agent.

inputs.name: unityProjectPath
inputs.label: Unity Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Enter the directory path to the Unity project. If no value is entered, the root of the repository will be used.

inputs.name: testCategory
inputs.label: Test Category
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) A semicolon-separated list of test categories to include in the run. If using both testFilter and testCategory, then tests only run that matches both.

inputs.name: testFilter
inputs.label: Test Filter
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) A semicolon-separated list of test names to run, or a regular expression pattern to match tests by their full name.

inputs.name: batchMode
inputs.label: Batch Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Indicate whether Unity executes in batch mode. Note: When testing Unity UI functionality, you cannot use batch mode.

inputs.name: acceptApiUpdate
inputs.label: Run API Updater
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Use this option to specify that Unity API Updater should run before building the project.

inputs.name: testResultsPath
inputs.label: Test Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) The path where Unity should save the result file. By default, Unity saves it in the Projectâ€™s root folder.

inputs.name: additionalCmdArgs
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Specify additional command line arguments, see the [documentation](https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.test-framework@latest) for more info.

OutputVariables.name: testResultsOutputPathAndFileName
OutputVariables.description: Path and FileName of the results in XML format. Path is relative to repository root.

OutputVariables.name: logsOutputPath
OutputVariables.description: Path to the Unity editor log files generated.

messages.TestSuccess: The Unity test run completed successfully
messages.TestFailed: The Unity test run failed with exit code
messages.WarningAlphaBetaVersion: You are using a Unity Alpha/Beta version. It may not be supported by the extension!
messages.ProjectPathInfo: Determining Unity editor version for project at
messages.FailGetUnityEditorVersion: Fail, Unity editor version not found
